channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Block Bad Bots and Stop Bad Bots Crawlers and Spiders and Anti Spam Protection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Block Bad Bots and Stop Bad Bots Crawlers and Spiders and Anti Spam Protection

item.title: CVE-2021-25070|2024-08-03T19:56:09.968Z -- unknown -- block%20bad%20bots%20and%20stop%20bad%20bots%20crawlers%20and%20spiders%20and%20anti%20spam%20protection
item.description: The Block Bad Bots WordPress plugin before 6.88 does not properly sanitise and escape the User Agent before using it in a SQL statement to record logs, leading to an SQL Injection issue

item.title: CVE-2022-3883|2024-08-03T01:20:58.630Z -- unknown -- block%20bad%20bots%20and%20stop%20bad%20bots%20crawlers%20and%20spiders%20and%20anti%20spam%20protection
item.description: The Block Bad Bots and Stop Bad Bots Crawlers and Spiders and Anti Spam Protection WordPress plugin before 7.24 does not have proper authorisation and CSRF in an AJAX action, allowing any authenticated users, such as subscriber to call it and install and activate arbitrary plugins from wordpress.org
